Episode 159 Guest: Valerie Andrianova

28 Jun 2021 |

In this episode we talk about JetBrains Space, with Valerie Andrianova

Comments

Valerie Andrianova

Valerie specializes in team tools, team collaboration, and project management methodologies. Apart from product marketing, her role is to help different teams at JetBrains to establish themost suitable and productive process to achieve their specific goals and meet their requirements.
